attachSource

public boolean attachSource(SegmentSource segmentSource)
                     throws NITFException
Attaches the specified SegmentSource to this SegmentWriter

Parameters:
segmentSource - the SegmentSource to attach
Returns:
true if it attached successfully, false otherwise
Throws:
NITFException - if a SegmentSource has already been attached, or if an error occurs
